data.name: WICKED AEONS
data.detailed_description:
If you're interested in Wicked Aeons, please wishlist and follow us :)


WICKED AEONS is an innovative game, a real-time tactical RPG with a tactical break. Control teams of heroes to roam the ruthless city of Abjectalia.





Enter Wicked Aeons, a real-time tactical RPG set in a Dark Fantasy & Cyberpunk universe.
Take control of 4 students from Blades School to advance against the dark forces of Abjectalia
of Abjectalia, a controlled city of violence and hatred.
Once your mission is complete, return to the academy to recruit new heroes, create
potions, craft pacts... and much more.




Wicked Aeons is based on a gameplay loop between Hub & Mission. Enjoy gameplay phases in the academy where you can manage your team, your equipment, consumables, etc.

Once your students are upgraded and revitalized, go on missions, which will be varied: kill several enemies, destroy number of enemies, destroy artifacts without being detected, complete a mission in a given time limit...

Achieve your goals with a team of 4 heroes and take advantage of synergies between them.
Build the best team by choosing from 10 different classes, going from shooters to tanks passing by assassins, healers and many more to discover in Wicked Aeons.

Once on in a mission you'll have to deal with different groups of enemies depending on the area you're in.

Acid Pills in the Shallows, Cultists in the Catacombs, Black Mages in the Palace & Gardens
and finally, you won't know about the last sector, it’s always good to keep a little surprise.

To eliminate all these opponents, you can count on the tactical break, it will allow you to
to take time to manage your placements & attacks which will be activated at the end of this moment of respite.

The relationship system is also extremely important, depending on the choices you make, your heroes will be more or less friendly with each other which will impact their statistics.




Wicked Aeons being a Tactical RPG, our game uses a lot of features:
- Relationship system: Your heroes will play together and will have to make choices. According to these choices their relationships will evolve, and this will impact the game and the strategy to adopt

- Pacts: Some of your students will be given pacts depending on the decisions you make. It will give you bonuses and maluses. If one of your hero falls in battle, upon resurrection, the pacts assigned to the hero will be assigned with a cursed mark, which will lower their bonuses and increase their maluses.

- The tactical pause: It allows you to stop time as you wish in a mission in order to manage your attacks, your placements and the queue of actions. Once this is done, you can deactivate it to see what you have ordered go into action.

- Talent Tree: A classic tree that allows you to manage upgrades but also to unlock new spells.

- Choice of spells: You will unlock a certain number of spells, but a hero can only use 4 of them hero can only use 4 of them during the mission. In the hub phase you can choose which ones you will need to complete the next objective.

- Bosses: The bosses are high level and will put to the test your most advanced strategies.

- Not permanent death: Your heroes may fall in battle, but they can be picked up, unfortunately if your 4 heroes die at the same time they will be lost. Once in the hub if you wish, you can resurrect them for a large amount of resources.

- Threat level: In Wicked Aeons, each mission has its own threat level which represents the difficulty. This level increases as you progress in the game. The higher it is, the more damage you will do, but as the enemies. They’ll also be more numerous. You will also gain more experience and resources.



Wicked Aeons takes place in the universe of Tenebrae. A world developed by the founder of our studio our studio, and first released in books. Book 1 is already available on our website shop.angelcorp.org
The capital of Tenebrae is Abjectalia, a city founded by dark forces that dominate the city.
These mages decided to create Blades School, an academy to train teenagers to become assassins or super-powerful mages in the dictatorship's employ.
However, this city is divided into neighbourhoods, each one worse than the other.
You will embody these students and try to complete quests through different sectors in order to discover the darkest secrets of Abjectalia!
